name: Aptos Labs
description: Building on the Aptos blockchain. For updates and information on the Aptos network.

name: Thala Labs
description: Building $MOD, a decentralized, yield-bearing stablecoin, and the liquidity provisioning layer on Aptos.

name: Pontem
description: Pontem is a product development studio building products with Move on Aptos and other L1s. We partnered with Aptos to build foundational products which enable adoption for billions of users.

name: Aptos Monkeys
description: Cute collection of Monkeys with Jungle vibes looking to live on the upcoming Aptos Blockchain. Community, innovation and resourcefulness will be the values we abide by.

name: Aptomingos
description: 1212 flamingos on the Aptos blockchain striving for a stronger and more educated ecosystem.

name: Aptos Name Service
description: Aptos Names is a naming & identity service for web3. Part of the Aptos family. Secure your .apt domain for your journey through the Aptos ecosystem.

name: Topaz
description: Topaz is an NFT marketplace built on the powerful Aptos blockchain, with a focus on safety and scalability.

name: Petra Wallet
description: Petra Wallet is an interface to the Aptos blockchain. Petra Wallet is a free web application available as a Google Chrome extension that lets users store and transfer assets, create and view NFTs, and interact with decentralized applications (dApps), all on the Aptos blockchain.

name: Martian Wallet
description: Martian wallet is a crypto wallet that can be used to manage digital assets and access decentralized applications on the Aptos and Sui blockchain. Martian wallet is currently available as a Chrome extension and soon will be available as an IOS app.

name: Fewcha Wallet
description: Fewcha is a non-custodial Web3.0 wallet and also the first wallet developed for blockchain using Move Smart Contract. Fewcha Wallet allows users to transfer cryptocurrency freely between their wallet and DApps.

name: Souffl3
description: NextGen Smart Trading NFT Market. NFT eco leader built on Aptos.

name: Ferum
description: Ferum is an asset-agnostic, consolidated limit order book (CLOB) that provides unprecedented control to liquidity providers, currently deployed on the Aptos Blockchain testnet.
